overview: Somewhere in Sarajevo, an introverted woman named Lejla visits a doctor in order to resolve a mysterious business. The decisions that she makes here will change her life forever. Soon we discovered that Lejla is an actress who is about to attend a very important audition. Against what she expected, the role is taken by her college Sejla, which will increase Lejla's personal frustration. This will lead her to a state of anxiety that will precipitate her calculated plans, revealing that her real intention was to kill Lejla and steal her identity. Although everything seems to work as she planned it, quite soon Lejla's new face starts to cracks, as if her body was rejecting her new self. This will bring her terrible consequences.
title: Bezličan
